name: Scanner PoC for CVE-2019-0708 RDP RCE Vuln
description: Detects the use of a scanner by zerosum0x0 that discovers targets vulnerable to  CVE-2019-0708 RDP RCE aka BlueKeep
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4625 AND winlog.event_data.TargetUserName:AAAAAAA)`
